meanings.definition: Extended or stretched out to its full length.
meanings.sent1: Her outstretched arms reached for the cookie jar on the top shelf.
meanings.sent2: The cat lay comfortably on the outstretched blanket in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The outstretched giraffe tried to reach the leaves on the tallest tree.
meanings.sent4: The outstretched bridge connected the two sides of the river seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The outstretched rope barely reached the ground, making it hard to climb down.

meanings.definition: Reaching out or extending beyond its normal position.
meanings.sent1: The outstretched branches of the tree provided shade on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: She waved to her friend with an outstretched hand as they approached.
meanings.sent3: The outstretched octopus tentacles startled the curious diver.
meanings.sent4: The outstretched shadows of the trees danced in the fading light.
meanings.sent5: The outstretched fingers of the puppeteer brought the characters to life on stage.
